_field_real.name: Min distance:world units#the minimum distance before a decal is generated.
Max distance:world units#the maximum distance before a decal is generated.
Distance velocity scale#the amount to scale the velocity while calculating the distance between verts
Max offset:world units#the maximum distance from the contact point to generate quads. This can be used to hide some of the poping
Offset velocity scale#the amount to scale the velocity while calculating the velocity-based offset
Contact patch width:world units#the width of the tire
Contact patch length:world units#the amount of the tire that contacts the surface from front to back. This length is used when the tire is sliding sideways instead of the width
Texture U repeat length:world units#the length of tire track before the texture repeats in the U direction
